verses.text: And \w Bezaleel|strong="H1212"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*: two \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \add was\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of it, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of it, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* of it:

And he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* and \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* to it round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And he \w cast|strong="H3332"\w* for it \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add to be set\add* by the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6471"\w* of it; even \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* upon the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of it, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* upon the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of it.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And he \w put|strong="H0935"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* into the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* by the \w sides|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: two \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \add was\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and one \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, beaten out of one \w piece|strong="H4749"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he them, on the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*;\f + \fr 37.7 \ft on…: or, out of, etc\f*

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* on the \w end|strong="H7098"\w* on this side, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* on the \add other\add* \w end|strong="H7098"\w* on that side: out of the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* on the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 37.8 \ft on the end: or, out of, etc\f*\f + \fr 37.8 \ft on the other end: or, out of, etc\f*

And the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* spread \w out|strong="H6566"\w* \add their\add* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* on \w high|strong="H4605"\w*, \add and\add* \w covered|strong="H5526"\w* with their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* over the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*, with their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H0251"\w*; \add even\add* to the mercy \w seatward|strong="H3727"\w* were the \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*: two \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* thereof:

And he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thereunto a \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

Also he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thereunto a \w border|strong="H4526"\w* of an \w handbreadth|strong="H2948"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*; and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* for the \w border|strong="H4526"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And he \w cast|strong="H3332"\w* for it \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* upon the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6285"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* thereof.

Over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w border|strong="H4526"\w* were the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, the \w places|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* which \add were\add* upon the \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, his \w dishes|strong="H7086"\w*, and his \w spoons|strong="H3709"\w*, and his \w bowls|strong="H4518"\w*, and his \w covers|strong="H7184"\w* to \w cover|strong="H5258"\w* \w withal|strong="H2004"\w*, \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.\f + \fr 37.16 \ft to cover…: or, to pour out withal\f*

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \add of\add* beaten \w work|strong="H4749"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*; his \w shaft|strong="H3409"\w*, and his \w branch|strong="H7070"\w*, his \w bowls|strong="H1375"\w*, his \w knops|strong="H3730"\w*, and his \w flowers|strong="H6525"\w*, were of the same:

And \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* going \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w sides|strong="H6654"\w* thereof; \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* out of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w* thereof, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* out of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w* thereof:

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w bowls|strong="H1375"\w* made after the fashion of \w almonds|strong="H8246"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w branch|strong="H7070"\w*, a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* and a \w flower|strong="H6525"\w*; and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w bowls|strong="H1375"\w* made like \w almonds|strong="H8246"\w* in \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w branch|strong="H7070"\w*, a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* and a \w flower|strong="H6525"\w*: so throughout the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* going \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*.

And in the \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* \add were\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w bowls|strong="H1375"\w* made like \w almonds|strong="H8246"\w*, his \w knops|strong="H3730"\w*, and his \w flowers|strong="H6525"\w*:

And a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* under \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the same, and a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* under \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the same, and a \w knop|strong="H3730"\w* under \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* of the same, according to the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* going \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of it.

Their \w knops|strong="H3730"\w* and their \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* were of the same: all of it \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* beaten \w work|strong="H4749"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* his \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, and his \w snuffers|strong="H4457"\w*, and his \w snuffdishes|strong="H4289"\w*, \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.
\add Of\add* a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* of \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he it, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*: the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of it \add was\add* a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of it a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*; \add it was\add* \w foursquare|strong="H7251"\w*; and two \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w height|strong="H6967"\w* of it; the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* thereof were of the same.

And he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* it with \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add both\add* the \w top|strong="H1406"\w* of it, and the \w sides|strong="H7023"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of it: also he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* unto it a \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* for it under the \w crown|strong="H2213"\w* thereof, by the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w corners|strong="H6763"\w* of it, upon the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sides|strong="H6654"\w* thereof, to be \w places|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* it withal.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and the \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* of sweet \w spices|strong="H5561"\w*, according to the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w apothecary|strong="H7543"\w*.
